item.title: @elonmusk: NEWS: Tesla spotted testing the redesigned Tesla Semi for the first time in Fremont, CA. ‚Ä¢ Model Y s...
item.description: NEWS: Tesla spotted testing the redesigned Tesla Semi for the first time in Fremont, CA. ‚Ä¢ Model Y style light bar ‚Ä¢ More efficient ‚Ä¢ Increased payload capability ‚Ä¢ 1.7kWh/mile (15% improvement vs old Semi) ‚Ä¢ Designed for autonomy ‚Ä¢ 500 mile range ‚Ä¢ 1.2MW (1,200kW) peak charging speed ‚Ä¢ 800kW drive power ‚Ä¢ Side windows don't go as far back ‚Ä¢ Heavy duty metal anti-slip traction strips on side steps ‚Ä¢ A lot more under the skin improvements Volume production starts soon. Drone footage via MetGod:youtu.be/watch?v=HNJ2_25k‚Ä¶

item.title: @elonmusk: OPENAI FOUNDERS PLOTTED TO OUST ELON IN 2017 New court docs reveal the plot was never about "safety"...
item.description: OPENAI FOUNDERS PLOTTED TO OUST ELON IN 2017 New court docs reveal the plot was never about "safety" it was about getting rich Greg Brockman‚Äôs private diary from Sept 2017 exposes the scheme to kick Elon out: "This is the only chance we have to get out from Elon... Financially, what will take me to $1B?" He admitted that keeping Elon involved would "nuke the economics" for the founders They were already plotting to ditch the non-profit mission and sideline Musk- while publicly preaching "benefit humanity" They were privately calculating how to become billionaires The mask slips ü§°

item.title: @elonmusk: STARLINK NEWS: Globe Telecom has partnered with SpaceX to introduce Starlink Direct-to-Cell (DTC) in...
item.description: STARLINK NEWS: Globe Telecom has partnered with SpaceX to introduce Starlink Direct-to-Cell (DTC) in the Philippines, marking the first deployment of this technology in Southeast Asia and the second in Asia. The service enables standard LTE smartphones to connect directly to Starlink's constellation to provide text messaging, voice, data, and internet-of-things services in remote, underserved, or no-coverage areas without requiring additional hardware or apps. A ceremonial Memorandum of Agreement signing was witnessed by Philippines President Ferdinand Marcos Jr., the initiative supports digital inclusion under the theme "Every Filipino Connected" and aims for commercial availability starting in March 2026. SpaceX's Starlink Sr Partnership Manager, Damien Innes, represented the company and signed the agreement.

item.title: @elonmusk: BREAKING: Stephen Miller just CALLED OUT what's happening across America between Democrats and DHS a...
item.description: BREAKING: Stephen Miller just CALLED OUT what's happening across America between Democrats and DHS and he didn't HOLD BACK! "This is clearly an INSURGENCY against the federal government. They are describing the federal government as an occupying force." "If you were to permit individual cities and states to ratify their own immigration laws for themselves, then you wouldn't have a republic and you wouldn't have a country, and that's the proposition that Fry and Ellison and Walsh are trying to test." "They are asserting that they have the unfettered right to harbor aliens who have no right to be in this country, and to incite a violent insurrection from organized agitators against federal forces to prevent those federal forces from effectuating duly enacted immigration law." It's time to INVOKE THE INSURRECTION ACT NOW!
